labels.name: advance developer workflow
labels.description: Issues related to behavior that address a workflow not part of the most common workflow.

labels.name: defect
labels.description: Functionality not meeting the documented behavior for that project.

labels.name: design
labels.description: Discussion around design for behavior that may, or may not, lead to modifications.

labels.name: documentation
labels.description: Installation and usage guides, along with tutorials for developers, consumers, and contributors.

labels.name: enhancement
labels.description: A change to a project's repository that adds new behavior for downstream consumers.

labels.name: help wanted
labels.description: We need the community's help to address this issue through the contribution of a pull request.

labels.name: operations
labels.description: Tasks that do not require modifications to a project's repository.

labels.name: refactor
labels.description: A modification to a project's repository that will not change the behavior for downstream consumers.

labels.name: security
labels.description: Please file security related issues and incidents as confidential.

labels.name: suggestion
labels.description: Proposal for a change to the project where consensus may be needed.

labels.name: support
labels.description: Issues that do not require modifications to a project, such as questions, guidance, etc.

labels.name: technical debt
labels.description: Task that, if done now, will lower the cost of future work.

labels.name: test
labels.description: Issues related to a project's test suite, such as unit, integration, or end-to-end tests.

labels.name: upstream
labels.description: Issue can only be resolved by fixing, or enhancing, an upstream dependency.
